arm_group.arm_group_label: Breast Cancer Cases Among Men with No Exposure to Finasteride
arm_group.description: The number of new cases of male breast cancer among men with no exposure to finasteride in the registries of Denmark, Finland, Sweden, and Norway.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Breast Cancer Cases Among Men with Exposure to Finasteride
arm_group.description: The number of new cases of male breast cancer among men exposed to finasteride in the registries of Denmark, Finland, Sweden, and Norway.

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to investigate the potential association between finasteride
      (MK-0906) exposure and the development of breast cancer in men residing in Denmark, Sweden,
      Finland, and Norway from data in national registries.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Observational Registry-Based Study of a Potential Link Between Finasteride (MK-0906) and Male Breast Cancer in 4 Nordic Countries (MK-0906-162/2003.021)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Participant's study medical information available in population-based health and
             medical registries, prescription registries, and mortality registries in Denmark,
             Finland, Norway, or Sweden within the observation period of 1995 to 2009

          -  Male with breast cancer with medical information in one of the 4 country-specific
             registries in this study

          -  Study participant's exposure to finasteride is available

study_pop.textblock:
Population-based health and medical registries, prescription registries, and mortality
        registries in Denmark, Finland, Norway, and Sweden

intervention.arm_group_label: Breast Cancer Cases Among Men with Exposure to Finasteride
intervention.description: Prescribed as per routine clinical practice in Denmark, Sweden, Finland, and Norway.

clinical_study.official_title: A Multinational, Observational Registry-Based Study of a Potential Link Between Finasteride and Male Breast Cancer in 4 Nordic Countries

oversight_info.authority: Denmark: Danish Health and Medicines Authority

primary_outcome.measure: Person-Years of Exposure to Finasteride by Participant Age and Year
Incidence Rates of Male Breast Cancer by Exposure to Finasteride
All-Cause Mortality Rates in Males with Breast Cancer by Exposure to Finasteride

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

collaborator.agency: Institute for Applied Economics and Health Research Aps

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective
